questions.question: Considering the overall layout and typography, what is the primary function indicated by the prominent text and tabular data on the presented rectangular label?

Focusing on the fats in the nutritional breakdown, what is the quantity of saturated fat given in grams per serving?
Referring to the carbohydrate information, what is the amount of total carbohydrates listed in grams per serving?

What is the quantity of protein, listed in grams per serving, indicated in the nutritional facts section of this label?
Based on the label's nutritional information, what is the sodium content per serving expressed in milligrams?
What is the total number of servings contained within the product packaging as specified on the label?
What is the weight of a single serving of the product, as expressed in grams on this nutritional label?

What is the overall shape or form factor of the surface area on which the nutritional information is displayed?
